name: Kevin(1997-2077)
description:
What can you expect in this game?

Reading!

Yes, only read.


Kevin(1997-2077) is a wander and wonder game. Roam through expansive landscapes using your keyboard to navigate and capture your experiences with your mouse. Encounter a multitude of friends, some authentic and others Imaginary, each contributing to the enigmatic story of Kevin. Dive deep into his most profound and intimate emotions, unlocking a narrative that unveils his true self, discernible by exploring the depths of his heart. All of this, however, is accessible only if you possess the ability to read.

  • Meet 200+ friends from all around the world.
  • Delve into Kevin's deepest thoughts in the darkness.
  • Listen as Kevin counts numbers from 1 to 29200.
  • Unlimited read and write.
  • Colorful tutorial.
  • A conclusion awaits.


Wanna see an example? Here is a private note for you:
